item.title: UAS Raichur convocation tomorrow
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Raichur: The University of Agricultural Sciences, Raichur is set to hold its 14th convocation on May 26 at 11am in the university auditorium, as announced by vice-chancellor M Hanumanthappa. The institution will confer 488 degrees across various academic levels.During a press interaction on Saturday, he informed that governor and chancellor Thaawar Chand Gehlot will preside over the ceremony alongside agriculture minister N Cheluvarayaswamy. Pankaja Mittal, general secretary of the Federatio...]]>
item.author: Tnn
